data: ALLERGY Penicillin Desensitization (16-Step Protocol)
Patient Care
Vital Signs
Prior to, between doses changes and 60 minutes after penicillin desensitization. Then BID as per routine care
Skin Assessment
Once, prior to penicillin desensitization
Communication Order
Minimize interruptions during penicillin desensitization, penicillin must be continuously infused to minimize risk of developing a reaction
Communication Order
During and after penicillin desensitization, observe for signs of allergic reaction and anaphylaxis
Patient Education
Educate patient not to miss any doses or stop penicillin unless signs or symptoms of allergic reaction occur. If a dose is missed, the desensitization protocol may need to be started again
Medications
Provider to change desensitization start date and time using the 'start' field at the top of the PowerPlan if required
Provider to ensure ongoing dose of penicillin is ordered after desensitization completed. Ongoing dose is not included in this PowerPlan
